title: Not My Job: We Ask Football And Old Spice Star Terry Crews About Cruises
teaser: Before he was the star of a hilarious series of Old Spice commercials, Terry Crews played for the championship Western Michigan University Broncos in Kalamazoo. Originally broadcast March 22, 2014.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
